text.0: even far and wide o varuṇa and mitra doth your grace extend.
text.1: may i obtain your kind goodwill.
text.2: from you benignant gods may we gain fully food for sustenance.
text.3: such o ye rudras my we be.
text.4: guard us o rudras with your guar4 save us ye skilled to save my we.
text.6: or neer may we o wondrous strong enjoy anothers solemn feast.
